text:
Message 3315 of 4024
I proposed going to Andy. Not selectively deciding what to pick from his therapy based on your plan. This is what you did with Yurushka, Debbie,
Dr Brown, and Kari. Every single therapist we have ever seen, or in this case, have not even seen. I am making it clear that your interpretation and
selective adoption of therapy rules is not all what I proposed.
BTW- “Till we get a determination” , I realize you have outsourced your marriage in parenting to a series of lawyers, Susan, James, Annalisa, Natalie,
but on my side, I make the decisions. So no “determination” happens without me. I hope you will consider taking control again. This doesn’t work.
Sent:06/21/2024 at 08:49 AM
From:Robert Moyer
To:Christine Moyer (First Viewed: 06/21/2024 at 09:29 AM)
Subject:Re: Another Escalation
Message 3316 of 4024
I wish you well Robert.
Sent:06/21/2024 at 09:32 AM
From:Christine Moyer
To:Robert Moyer (First Viewed: 06/21/2024 at 09:35 AM)
Subject:Re: Hangers
Message 3317 of 4024
I find Andy’s protocols for communication very helpful
If you disagree then I am uncertain what the intent of your proposal is. It centers solely on rules of engagement for communication protocols between
the parties.
Following his suggestion I will step away.
Thank you.
Sent:06/21/2024 at 09:37 AM
From:Christine Moyer
To:Robert Moyer (First Viewed: 06/21/2024 at 09:42 AM)
Subject:Re: Another Escalation
Message 3318 of 4024
The proposal was to get co-parenting counseling.
You know that. For you to just selectively say you want to “play therapy” by adopting the rules you like with a referee or professional oversight is
disingenuous.
If you reach outs and confirm that his whole program is juts following these rules, I’m in. But I am pretty sure we are still missing a key participate in
therapy.
No comment on the “stepping away.” It’s actually no different than when you are fully engaged. ‘Drive by’ response to poke and then go dark to
Sent:06/21/2024 at 03:27 PM
From:Robert Moyer
To:Christine Moyer (First Viewed: 06/21/2024 at 04:36 PM)
Subject:Re: Another Escalation
